name: Totem Finder
description: The game is called totem finder. The current version of the game has 3 levels. Action: The player is in an unknown forest without any memory, following the paths and signs he will have to find parts of the totem to be able to get out of the current "dream", however there are the defenders of the forest and their ruler who will try to catch the player because he is not wanted .The ruler follows us through all three levels and it is impossible to kill him until all 3 main totems are collected. At the end, the player will understand that it was all a display of nature trying to prevent destruction.
